items.title: SEBI proposes changes in lock in for conversion from private InvIT to public InvIT
items.description: Market particpants had also suggested that unitholders who have already invested in the InvIT should not be subject to further lock-in during the conversion process and hence they should be exempted from the lock-in requirement or the lock-in should be reduced to 6 months.

items.title: IDFC First Bank shares gain 6% after Investec upgrades stock to 'Buy'
items.description: IDFC First Bank shares hit an intraday high of Rs 77.39 apiece, the highest level seen by the stock is nearly 11 months.

items.title: RBL Bank shares jump 21% in one month: What's driving the rally?
items.description: RBL Bank share price: The shares of the lender have gained over 64% in the past six months. The stock has recorded gains in seven out of the past eight sessions.

items.title: Taking Stock: Market ends flat in rangebound session; mid, smallcap rally halts
items.description: More than 150 stocks on the BSE touched their 52-week highs, including JK Lakshmi Cement, Endurance Technoogies, City Union Bank, Apollo Hospitals, Federal Bank, Bharat Electronics, Laurus Labs.

items.title: CG Power QIP sees bids worth Rs 10,000 crore pour in; MFs, insurance, long-only FPIs biggest bidders
items.description: Amongst mutual funds, Axis MF, Aditya Birla MF, WhiteOak Capital MF, and HDFC MF have put in significant sized bids with insurance majors like SBI Life Insurance and HDFC Life Insurance also participating in the QIP in a big way.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Top 10 stocks that moved the most on July 1, 2025
items.description: At close, the Sensex was up 90.83 points or 0.11 percent at 83,697.29, and the Nifty was up 24.75 points or 0.10 percent at 25,541.80. About 1971 shares advanced, 1889 shares declined, and 150 shares unchanged.

items.title: Live: Nifty above 25,500 in a choppy session; broader mkts snap 7-day rally | Closing Bell
items.description: Nifty Above 25,500 In A Choppy Session. Sensex Rises 100 Pts On Weekly Expiry Day. Advance-decline Ratio At 1:1, India Vix Slips 2(%). Broader Markets Snap 7-day Run Up. Nifty PSU. Bank Extends Rise To Sixth Day. FMCG, IT, Realty Stocks Underperform. Nifty 50 Gainers: Apollo Hospital, BEL, RIL. Nifty 50 Laggards: Nestle, Axis Bank, Shriram Finance. Catch Nandita Khemka and Lovisha Darad as they discuss stocks on their radar.

items.title: Small, midcap stocks tumble; broader market indices snap 7-day gaining streak: Here are the top losers
items.description: Broader market indices had seen significant surge in the recent days, with the market capitalization of midcap and smallcap indices surging by a whopping Rs 2.45 lakh crore and Rs 3.41 lakh crore respectively in just 7 sessions.

items.title: GIFT City emerges as top financial center for family offices navigating India's regulatory maze, says Julius Baer-EY
items.description: More ultra-rich families and entrepreneurs are turning to family offices to manage their wealth, though concerns over legal and compliance hurdles persist.

items.title: Sensex up 100 pts, Nifty tests 24,550; IT, pharma, FMCG stocks fall; small, midcaps snap 7-day streak
items.description: India VIX dipped after a slight uptick in the previous session as it continues to hover below the psychological mark of 15, indicating a stable and low-volatility environment.

items.title: BEL, BDL, HAL, other defence shares gain for 4th day: Here are likely triggers for the rally
items.description: Bharat Electronics shares touched a fresh 52-week high following new order announcements, while Nifty Defence rose over 1% in intraday trade and has gained more than 3% over the past four sessions.

items.title: Sigachi Industries shares plunge 7%, extend losses to 2nd day after reactor blast kills 34 at Telangana plant
items.description: Sigachi Industries share price: The company said it is pausing operations at the affected plant for 90 days as the incident damaged certain ancillary equipment and civil structures.

items.title: Gabriel India shares hit 20% upper circuit, scale to new record high on restructuring plan
items.description: Gabriel India shares surged 20 percent after unveiling a multi-tier restructuring plan involving the merger of Anchemco and a demerger of Asia Investments’ auto assets.

items.title: PSU bank stocks snap 5-day gaining streak amid profit booking; Union Bank of India, BoB among top losers
items.description: Bank stocks have been in focus recently, with private and PSU bank stocks seeing significant surge and pushing the broader Nifty Bank index to fresh lifetime highs.

items.title: Ipca Laboratories share price falls 2.01% during today's session
items.description: The stock's movement today aligns with a neutral sentiment analysis as of June 30, 2025, according to Moneycontrol analysis.

items.title: Dr Reddys Laboratories stock flat in today's session amid high volume trading
items.description: The latest price stands at Rs 1282.90, reflecting the market's response to these factors.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade SBI Life, Federal Bank, CESC, Jubilant Foodworks, Carborundum Universal, Kolte-Patil Developers, and others on July 2?
items.description: The frontline indices are expected to see further consolidation in upcoming sessions before potentially entering a new leg of the uptrend. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.
